insert into t_erp_summary_data SELECT uuid_short(),'main-2-pro-new',SUM(v.quantity),d.value,ifnull(shop_id,0) shopid,NOW() from (SELECT amazonAuthId,sum(case when t.invalid=0 and t.isparent=0 then 1 ELSE 0 END) quantity FROM t_product_info t GROUP BY t.amazonAuthId) v left join t_amazon_auth a on a.id=v.amazonAuthId left join t_erp_summary_data d on d.shopid=a.shop_id and d.ftype='main-2-pro' group by a.shop_id; delete from t_erp_summary_data where ftype='main-2-pro'; update t_erp_summary_data SET ftype='main-2-pro' where ftype='main-2-pro-new';
select COUNT(0) from t_product_info t left join t_amazon_auth a on t.amazonAuthId=a.id where a.shop_id=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and t.invalid=0 and t.isparent=0
mapper.delete: delete t from t_erp_summary_data t where t.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} and t.ftype in('weekdata','lastqty','last5','market')
